metadata.title: USN-6533-1 -- Linux kernel (OEM) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Tom Dohrmann discovered that the Secure Encrypted Virtualization (SEV) implementation for AMD processors in the Linux kernel contained a race condition when accessing MMIO registers. A local attacker in a SEV guest VM could possibly use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2023-46813)  It was discovered that the io_uring subsystem in the Linux kernel contained a race condition, leading to a null pointer dereference vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash). (CVE-2023-46862)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6533-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-buildinfo-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-headers-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-image-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-modules-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-modules-ipu6-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-modules-ivsc-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-modules-iwlwifi-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-oem-6.1-headers-6.1.0-1027 - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-oem-6.1-tools-6.1.0-1027 - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-oem-6.1-tools-host - 6.1.0-1027.27 linux-tools-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27 No subscription required  linux-headers-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-headers-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-headers-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-headers-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-image-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-image-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-image-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-image-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-tools-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-tools-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-tools-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1027.28 linux-tools-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1027.28 No subscription required
